title: Vintage Style Letter Hook
body:
Extremely useful vintage style painted metal letter hooks, we love the fact that these not only look good but are a great way of making every one hang their coats/towels etc. in the right place.

They will be sent out to you individually gift wrapped in cellophane and tied with ribbon.They come with all wall fixings.

  PLEASE NOTE "&" IS NOT AVAILABLE IN THIS PRODUCT

Size: Approx. H:21cm Width variable (depending on the letter).

Customer comments :-

I love the clothes hooks - great quality, FAB gifts, and I'll be ordering more for future birthdays and treating myself too. Very pleased with these.

Love them - fitted them to the walls for our children's coats the same day we received them

These are really great and look even better in real life than they do on the website.
